description.@en: You pour a line of salt upon the ground, calling for your god to deny the passage of the unliving across it.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you draw a threeyard long line upon the ground. Unless they successfully Resist with a Resolve Test, no creature classified as being Supernatural can cross it. If they do, they suffer [[/roll 1D10]]+[WB] Damage, whether they successfully Resisted it or not.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but triple the Duration.

criticalFailure.@en: Strange symbols begin to glow upon the ground. Those who behold these ebbing symbols whose Chaos Ranks are higher than their Order Ranks are subjected to Stress.

reagents.@en: A jar of epsom salt, poured upon the ground (expended)
